description: It was only going to be a hookup, but the guys fell for each other and have tried to make it work. But tragedy strikes when Jonathan is hit bit a car. He’ll survive, but not before Mitchell rock, a helpful bystander who escorts Jessy and Jonathan to the hospital, begins seducing Jessy. How strong is his resolve?
title: Jessy Ares and Jonathan Agassi Have Sweaty Sex
